featuresSection.heading: Diverse Rental Options Discover the Perfect Flat Types Available in Sector 59 Gurugram
description: Sector 59 offers a wide variety of flats catering to diverse tenant requirements. From affordable units perfect for singles to luxurious fully-furnished apartments ideal for large families the choice is abundant. Key factors driving demand here include proximity to the metro line access to major highways like the Delhi-Mathura road and the peaceful well-maintained environment of the sector.

When searching for a Flat For Rent in sector 59 consider factors such as society maintenance standards availability of power backup and security features. Our platform filters properties based on these essential amenities ensuring you only view listings that meet high living standards. We guide you through the pros and cons of different configurations helping you decide if a semi-furnished unit allows enough personalization or if a ready-to-move fully furnished flat provides better immediate convenience. Explore our specialized categories below to narrow down your optimal rental choice quickly and efficiently across Sector 59.

features.title: 1 BHK Apartment

faqSection.title: Essential Questions About Finding a Flat For Rent in sector 59 Gurugram Answered
faqSection.description: Get clear reliable answers about lease terms security deposits and living expenses specific to Sector 59 rental market dynamics ensuring you are fully prepared to move.

faqs.question: What is the typical security deposit required for a rental flat in Sector 59
faqs.answer: The standard practice in Sector 59 is generally two months rent as the refundable security deposit. This amount is typically held by the landlord throughout the tenancy and returned upon successful completion of the lease agreement subject to deductions for any damage beyond normal wear and tear. Always clarify the exact deposit structure and refund timeline before signing the lease document to ensure full understanding.

faqs.question: Are maintenance charges usually included in the monthly rent for flats here
faqs.answer: It varies significantly based on the society and the flat type. For high-rise apartments the common area maintenance CAM charges are often paid separately by the tenant to the Resident Welfare Association RWA. Sometimes the landlord may include the maintenance fee in the rent for simpler apartments but you must explicitly confirm if the quoted rental price is inclusive or exclusive of RWA maintenance fees.

faqs.question: What lease duration is most common for a Flat For Rent in sector 59
faqs.answer: The most common lease duration across Gurugram including Sector 59 is 11 months. This contract is generally renewable. Less common but available are 6-month leases for corporate tenants or 12-month agreements which may require mandatory renewal clauses. We recommend the 11-month agreement as it offers flexibility to both parties.

faqs.question: How soon should I start looking for a rental flat before my desired move-in date
faqs.answer: Due to high demand for quality rental units in Sector 59 we recommend starting your search at least 4 to 6 weeks before your intended move-in date. This timeframe allows sufficient time for property viewing lease negotiation and processing the necessary legal paperwork ensuring you secure the best options before they are taken.

faqs.question: Is Sector 59 considered a safe area for families and single women tenants
faqs.answer: Yes Sector 59 is widely regarded as one of the safer residential areas in Gurugram. The presence of well-established gated societies strong RWA oversight and proactive local police patrolling contribute to a very secure environment making it highly suitable for families and providing peace of mind for single tenants.

faqs.question: What are the common utility costs besides rent in this area
faqs.answer: Beyond the monthly rent and RWA charges tenants are typically responsible for electricity consumption water charges which are often subsidized or fixed depending on the society piped gas if available and internet and cable TV services. Budgeting an additional 10 to 15 percent of your rent for these utilities is a reasonable estimate.

faqs.question: Can I rent a semi-furnished or fully-furnished flat in Sector 59
faqs.answer: Both options are readily available in Sector 59. Semi-furnished flats usually include basic fittings like modular kitchens wardrobes and electrical fixtures. Fully-furnished options include furniture appliances and often essential crockery providing a true move-in ready experience for tenants who prefer minimal setup.

faqs.question: Are pets generally allowed in rental apartments in Sector 59 societies
faqs.answer: Pet policies are determined by the individual RWA or the specific landlord. While some modern societies are pet-friendly many older complexes have restrictions. If owning a pet is essential to your tenancy requirement please use our filters to search specifically for pet-allowed properties and discuss this point explicitly with the owner before booking.

faqs.question: How is the public transportation and road connectivity near the sector
faqs.answer: Connectivity is excellent. Sector 59 is well-served by local auto-rickshaws and shared cabs. It provides quick access to the closest metro station facilitating travel across the NCR. The main arterial roads surrounding the sector ensure smooth vehicular movement even during peak hours.

faqs.question: What documentation is required to finalize the Flat For Rent agreement
faqs.answer: Standard documentation includes photo identification Aadhar Card or Passport current address proof employment verification or student ID and two passport-sized photographs. The tenant and landlord must also provide attested copies of the final notarized rental agreement after signing.
